name: Passage Among Towers
description:
Your goal is to ensure the safe passage of as many people as possible by disabling the gun towers along the path.

Extra credits game jam challenges:
Extra CC0/CC-BY

Asset sources

Gunshot sound: http://soundbible.com/1547-M1-Garand-Single.html In-game assets: Top-down shooter pack, tower defense pack, and particle pack from https://kenney.nl/
UI font: https://www.fontspace.com/abdulmakesfonts/ua-cadet

Controls:


KeyboardJoypadMoveWASDLeft stickDisable tower
EA(XBOX)/Cross(PS)/B(Switch)
